```{r Load data and packages}
#load packages
```

```{r Edgelist Construction}
#Assign village
village <- metadata %>% select(social_netid, village) %>% rename("id1" = "social_netid") %>% distinct()

#Environmental network
enviro_adj2 <- enviro_adj %>% filter(network!="all", network!="village") %>% group_by(id1, id2, village) %>% summarise(weight=sum(weight))
enviro_adj2 <- enviro_adj2[!grepl("Z", enviro_adj2$id1),]
enviro_adj2 <- enviro_adj2[!grepl("Z", enviro_adj2$id2),]
enviro_mand_edge <- enviro_adj2 %>% filter(village =="M_Village") %>% select(id1, id2, weight)
enviro_sara_edge <- enviro_adj2 %>% filter(village =="S_Village") %>% select(id1, id2, weight)
enviro_anda_edge <- enviro_adj2 %>% filter(village =="A_Village") %>% select(id1, id2, weight) 

#Close Contact network
contact_adj <- left_join(contact_adj, village, by="id1")
contact_adj2 <- contact_adj[!grepl("Z", contact_adj$id1),]
contact_adj2 <- contact_adj2[!grepl("Z", contact_adj2$id2),]
contact_mand_edge <- contact_adj %>% filter(village =="M_Village") %>% select(id1, id2, close_contact_edge) %>% rename("weight" = "close_contact_edge") %>% filter(weight!=0)
contact_sara_edge <- contact_adj %>% filter(village =="S_Village") %>% select(id1, id2, close_contact_edge) %>% rename("weight" = "close_contact_edge") %>% filter(weight!=0)
contact_anda_edge <- contact_adj %>% filter(village =="A_Village") %>% select(id1, id2, close_contact_edge) %>% rename("weight" = "close_contact_edge") %>% filter(weight!=0)

#Naming network

name_undirected_man2 <-name_undirected_man$n.named
name_undirected_sara2 <-name_undirected_sara$n.named
name_undirected_anda2 <-name_undirected_anda$n.named

name_mand_edge <- igraph::as_data_frame(name_undirected_man2) %>% rename(id1 = from, id2 = to)
name_sara_edge <- igraph::as_data_frame(name_undirected_sara2)%>% rename(id1 = from, id2 = to)
name_anda_edge <- igraph::as_data_frame(name_undirected_anda2)%>% rename(id1 = from, id2 = to)

#Household distance network
house_dist <- house_dist[house_dist$dist!=0,]
house_dist$dist <- 1/house_dist$dist

distance_edges <- left_join(house_dist, village, by = "id1")%>% filter(dist !=0)
distance_mand_edge <- distance_edges %>% filter(village=="M_Village")
distance_anda_edge <- distance_edges %>% filter(village=="A_Village")
distance_sara_edge <- distance_edges %>% filter(village=="S_Village")


```

```{r Build Networks: M_Village}
#Setup intra-layer edge lists
enviro_mand_edge <- enviro_mand_edge %>% rename(node.from =id1, node.to = id2)%>% mutate(layer.from =1, layer.to =1) %>% select(node.from, layer.from, node.to, layer.to, weight) %>% mutate(weight = rescale(weight,to = c(0.01,1)))

contact_mand_edge <- contact_mand_edge %>% rename(node.from =id1, node.to = id2)%>% mutate(layer.from =2, layer.to =2)%>% select(node.from, layer.from, node.to, layer.to, weight)%>% mutate(weight = rescale(weight,to = c(0.01,1)))

name_mand_edge <- name_mand_edge %>% rename(node.from =id1, node.to = id2)%>% mutate(layer.from =3, layer.to =3)%>% select(node.from, layer.from, node.to, layer.to, weight)%>% mutate(weight = rescale(weight,to = c(0.01,1)))


ggplot(data= enviro_mand_edge, aes(x = weight))+ geom_histogram()
ggplot(data= contact_mand_edge, aes(x = weight))+ geom_histogram()
ggplot(data= name_mand_edge, aes(x = weight))+ geom_histogram()

mean(enviro_mand_edge$weight)
mean(contact_mand_edge$weight)
mean(name_mand_edge$weight)
mean(c(enviro_mand_edge$weight, contact_mand_edge$weight, name_mand_edge$weight))

name_mand_edge <- name_mand_edge %>% filter(node.to %in% node.from)#filter out people named in different villages 

```

```{r Build Networks: S_Village}
#Setup intra-layer edge lists
enviro_sara_edge <- enviro_sara_edge %>% rename(node.from =id1, node.to = id2)%>% mutate(layer.from =1, layer.to =1) %>% select(node.from, layer.from, node.to, layer.to, weight) %>% mutate(weight = rescale(weight,to = c(0.01,1)))
contact_sara_edge <- contact_sara_edge %>% rename(node.from =id1, node.to = id2)%>% mutate(layer.from =2, layer.to =2)%>% select(node.from, layer.from, node.to, layer.to, weight)%>% mutate(weight = rescale(weight,to = c(0.01,1)))
name_sara_edge <- name_sara_edge %>% rename(node.from =id1, node.to = id2)%>% mutate(layer.from =3, layer.to =3)%>% select(node.from, layer.from, node.to, layer.to, weight)%>% mutate(weight = rescale(weight,to = c(0.01,1)))

name_sara_edge <- name_sara_edge %>% filter(node.to %in% node.from)#filter out people named in different villages 



```

```{r Build Networks: A_Village}
#Setup intra-layer edge lists
enviro_anda_edge <- enviro_anda_edge %>% rename(node.from =id1, node.to = id2)%>% mutate(layer.from =1, layer.to =1) %>% select(node.from, layer.from, node.to, layer.to, weight) %>% mutate(weight = rescale(weight,to = c(0.01,1)))
contact_anda_edge <- contact_anda_edge %>% rename(node.from =id1, node.to = id2)%>% mutate(layer.from =2, layer.to =2)%>% select(node.from, layer.from, node.to, layer.to, weight)%>% mutate(weight = rescale(weight,to = c(0.01,1)))
name_anda_edge <- name_anda_edge %>% rename(node.from =id1, node.to = id2)%>% mutate(layer.from =3, layer.to =3)%>% select(node.from, layer.from, node.to, layer.to, weight)%>% mutate(weight = rescale(weight,to = c(0.01,1)))

name_anda_edge <- name_anda_edge %>% filter(node.to %in% node.from)#filter out people named in different villages 

```

```{r Single-layer Centrality}
#GET SINGLE-LAYER GRAPHS
#M_Village
enviro_mand_g <- graph_from_edgelist(as.matrix(enviro_mand_edge[,c(1,3)]), directed = FALSE)
name_mand_g <- graph_from_edgelist(as.matrix(name_mand_edge[,c(1,3)]), directed = FALSE)
contact_mand_g <- graph_from_edgelist(as.matrix(contact_mand_edge[,c(1,3)]), directed = FALSE)
distance_mand_g <- graph_from_edgelist(as.matrix(distance_mand_edge[,c(1,2)]), directed = FALSE)

enviro_mand_g<-simplify(enviro_mand_g, remove.multiple = FALSE, remove.loops = TRUE)
name_mand_g<-simplify(name_mand_g, remove.multiple = FALSE, remove.loops = TRUE)
contact_mand_g<-simplify(contact_mand_g, remove.multiple = FALSE, remove.loops = TRUE)
distance_mand_g<-simplify(distance_mand_g, remove.multiple = FALSE, remove.loops = TRUE)

E(enviro_mand_g)$weight <- enviro_mand_edge$weight
E(name_mand_g)$weight <- name_mand_edge$weight
E(contact_mand_g)$weight <- contact_mand_edge$weight
E(distance_mand_g)$weight <- distance_mand_edge$dist

#S_Village
enviro_sara_g <- graph_from_edgelist(as.matrix(enviro_sara_edge[,c(1,3)]), directed = FALSE)
name_sara_g <-graph_from_edgelist(as.matrix(name_sara_edge[,c(1,3)]), directed = FALSE)
contact_sara_g <- graph_from_edgelist(as.matrix(contact_sara_edge[,c(1,3)]), directed = FALSE)
distance_sara_g <- graph_from_edgelist(as.matrix(distance_sara_edge[,c(1,2)]), directed = FALSE)

enviro_sara_g<-simplify(enviro_sara_g, remove.multiple = FALSE, remove.loops = TRUE)
name_sara_g<-simplify(name_sara_g, remove.multiple = FALSE, remove.loops = TRUE)
contact_sara_g<-simplify(contact_sara_g, remove.multiple = FALSE, remove.loops = TRUE)
distance_sara_g<-simplify(distance_sara_g, remove.multiple = FALSE, remove.loops = TRUE)

E(enviro_sara_g)$weight <- enviro_sara_edge$weight
E(name_sara_g)$weight <- name_sara_edge$weight
E(contact_sara_g)$weight <- contact_sara_edge$weight
E(distance_sara_g)$weight <- distance_sara_edge$dist

#A_Village
enviro_anda_g <- graph_from_edgelist(as.matrix(enviro_anda_edge[,c(1,3)]), directed = FALSE)
name_anda_g <- graph_from_edgelist(as.matrix(name_anda_edge[,c(1,3)]), directed = FALSE)
contact_anda_g <- graph_from_edgelist(as.matrix(contact_anda_edge[,c(1,3)]), directed = FALSE)
distance_anda_g <- graph_from_edgelist(as.matrix(distance_anda_edge[,c(1,2)]), directed = FALSE)

E(enviro_anda_g)$weight <- enviro_anda_edge$weight
E(name_anda_g)$weight <- name_anda_edge$weight
E(contact_anda_g)$weight <- contact_anda_edge$weight
E(distance_anda_g)$weight <- distance_anda_edge$dist

enviro_anda_g<-simplify(enviro_anda_g, remove.multiple = FALSE, remove.loops = TRUE)
name_anda_g<-simplify(name_anda_g, remove.multiple = FALSE, remove.loops = TRUE)
contact_anda_g<-simplify(contact_anda_g, remove.multiple = FALSE, remove.loops = TRUE)
distance_anda_g<-simplify(distance_anda_g, remove.multiple = FALSE, remove.loops = TRUE)



#CALCULATE CENTRALITY
#Environmental networks
centrality_enviro_mand <- as.data.frame(page_rank(enviro_mand_g)$vector) 
centrality_enviro_mand$Node <- rownames(centrality_enviro_mand)
colnames(centrality_enviro_mand)[1] <- "PageRank"

centrality_enviro_sara <- as.data.frame(page_rank(enviro_sara_g)$vector) 
centrality_enviro_sara$Node <- rownames(centrality_enviro_sara)
colnames(centrality_enviro_sara)[1] <- "PageRank"

centrality_enviro_anda <- as.data.frame(page_rank(enviro_anda_g)$vector) 
centrality_enviro_anda$Node <- rownames(centrality_enviro_anda)
colnames(centrality_enviro_anda)[1] <- "PageRank"

#Close contact networks
centrality_contact_mand <- as.data.frame(page_rank(contact_mand_g)$vector) 
centrality_contact_mand$Node <- rownames(centrality_contact_mand)
colnames(centrality_contact_mand)[1] <- "PageRank"

centrality_contact_sara <- as.data.frame(page_rank(contact_sara_g)$vector) 
centrality_contact_sara$Node <- rownames(centrality_contact_sara)
colnames(centrality_contact_sara)[1] <- "PageRank"

centrality_contact_anda <- as.data.frame(page_rank(contact_anda_g)$vector) 
centrality_contact_anda$Node <- rownames(centrality_contact_anda)
colnames(centrality_contact_anda)[1] <- "PageRank"

#Naming networks
centrality_name_mand <- as.data.frame(page_rank(name_mand_g)$vector) 
centrality_name_mand$Node <- rownames(centrality_name_mand)
colnames(centrality_name_mand)[1] <- "PageRank"

centrality_name_sara <- as.data.frame(page_rank(name_sara_g)$vector) 
centrality_name_sara$Node <- rownames(centrality_name_sara)
colnames(centrality_name_sara)[1] <- "PageRank"

centrality_name_anda <- as.data.frame(page_rank(name_anda_g)$vector) 
centrality_name_anda$Node <- rownames(centrality_name_anda)
colnames(centrality_name_anda)[1] <- "PageRank"

#Distance networks
centrality_distance_mand <- as.data.frame(page_rank(distance_mand_g)$vector) 
centrality_distance_mand$Node <- rownames(centrality_distance_mand)
colnames(centrality_distance_mand)[1] <- "PageRank"

centrality_distance_sara <- as.data.frame(page_rank(distance_sara_g)$vector) 
centrality_distance_sara$Node <- rownames(centrality_distance_sara)
colnames(centrality_distance_sara)[1] <- "PageRank"

centrality_distance_anda <- as.data.frame(page_rank(distance_anda_g)$vector) 
centrality_distance_anda$Node <- rownames(centrality_distance_anda)
colnames(centrality_distance_anda)[1] <- "PageRank"


centrality_name_mand$Strength <- igraph::strength(name_mand_g)
centrality_name_mand$Betweenness <- igraph::betweenness(name_mand_g, weights = 1/E(name_mand_g)$weight, normalized = T)
centrality_name_mand$Eigen <- log(igraph::eigen_centrality(name_mand_g)$vector)

centrality_name_sara$Strength <- igraph::strength(name_sara_g)
centrality_name_sara$Betweenness <- igraph::betweenness(name_sara_g, weights =1/ E(name_sara_g)$weight, normalized = T)
centrality_name_sara$Eigen <- log(igraph::eigen_centrality(name_sara_g)$vector)

centrality_name_anda$Strength <- igraph::strength(name_anda_g)
centrality_name_anda$Betweenness <- igraph::betweenness(name_anda_g, weights = 1/E(name_anda_g)$weight, normalized = T)
centrality_name_anda$Eigen <- log(igraph::eigen_centrality(name_anda_g)$vector)


centrality_contact_mand$Strength <- igraph::strength(contact_mand_g)
centrality_contact_mand$Betweenness <- igraph::betweenness(contact_mand_g, weights = 1/E(contact_mand_g)$weight, normalized = T)
centrality_contact_mand$Eigen <- igraph::eigen_centrality(contact_mand_g)$vector

centrality_contact_sara$Strength <- igraph::strength(contact_sara_g)
centrality_contact_sara$Betweenness <- igraph::betweenness(contact_sara_g, weights = 1/E(contact_sara_g)$weight, normalized = T)
centrality_contact_sara$Eigen <- igraph::eigen_centrality(contact_sara_g)$vector

centrality_contact_anda$Strength <- igraph::strength(contact_anda_g)
centrality_contact_anda$Betweenness <- igraph::betweenness(contact_anda_g, weights = 1/E(contact_anda_g)$weight, normalized = T)
centrality_contact_anda$Eigen <- igraph::eigen_centrality(contact_anda_g)$vector


centrality_enviro_mand$Strength <- igraph::strength(enviro_mand_g)
centrality_enviro_mand$Betweenness <- igraph::betweenness(enviro_mand_g, weights = 1/E(enviro_mand_g)$weight, normalized = T)
centrality_enviro_mand$Eigen <- igraph::eigen_centrality(enviro_mand_g)$vector

centrality_enviro_sara$Strength <- igraph::strength(enviro_sara_g)
centrality_enviro_sara$Betweenness <- igraph::betweenness(enviro_sara_g, weights = 1/E(enviro_sara_g)$weight, normalized = T)
centrality_enviro_sara$Eigen <- igraph::eigen_centrality(enviro_sara_g)$vector

centrality_enviro_anda$Strength <- igraph::strength(enviro_anda_g)
centrality_enviro_anda$Betweenness <- igraph::betweenness(enviro_anda_g, weights = 1/E(enviro_anda_g)$weight, normalized = T)
centrality_enviro_anda$Eigen <- igraph::eigen_centrality(enviro_anda_g)$vector


centrality_distance_mand$Strength <- igraph::strength(distance_mand_g)
centrality_distance_mand$Betweenness <- igraph::betweenness(distance_mand_g, weights = 1/E(distance_mand_g)$weight, normalized = T)
centrality_distance_mand$Eigen <- igraph::eigen_centrality(distance_mand_g)$vector

centrality_distance_sara$Strength <- igraph::strength(distance_sara_g)
centrality_distance_sara$Betweenness <- igraph::betweenness(distance_sara_g, weights = 1/E(distance_sara_g)$weight, normalized = T)
centrality_distance_sara$Eigen <- igraph::eigen_centrality(distance_sara_g)$vector

centrality_distance_anda$Strength <- igraph::strength(distance_anda_g)
centrality_distance_anda$Betweenness <- igraph::betweenness(distance_anda_g, weights = 1/E(distance_anda_g)$weight, normalized = T)
centrality_distance_anda$Eigen <- igraph::eigen_centrality(distance_anda_g)$vector
```

```{r}
centrality_contact_mand$Type <- "Contact"

centrality_distance_anda$Type <- "House"
```

```{r Centrality Model Function}

perform_model_averaging <- function(data, season) {
  
  data$Strength <- scale(data$Strength,center = TRUE, scale = TRUE)
  data$PageRank <- scale(data$PageRank,center = TRUE, scale = TRUE)
  data$Betweenness <- scale(data$Betweenness,center = TRUE, scale = TRUE)
  data$Eigen <- scale(data$Eigen,center = TRUE, scale = TRUE)
  
  data <- data[data$season==season,]
  
  data$age <- scale(data$age)
  data$house_sol <- scale(data$house_sol)
  data$commercial_goods <- scale(data$commercial_goods)
  data$school_level <- scale(data$school_level)
  data$bmi <- scale(data$bmi)
  data$landsize_in_daba <- scale(data$landsize_in_daba)
  data$livestock <- scale(data$livestock)
  data$household_size <- scale(data$household_size)
  
  #PageRank
  pagerank_model <- lm(PageRank ~gender + age + house_sol + commercial_goods+ school_level+bmi+landsize_in_daba +livestock + household_size, data = data )

  
  options(na.action = "na.fail")
  pagerank_model_selection <- dredge(pagerank_model)
  options(na.action = "na.omit")
  
  pagerank_model_average <- summary(model.avg(pagerank_model_selection))
  
  pagerank_model_average_coef <- as.data.frame(pagerank_model_average$coefmat.full)
  pagerank_model_average_coef$model <- "PageRank"
  pagerank_model_average_coef$Variable <- rownames(pagerank_model_average_coef)
  
  #Strength
   strength_model <- lm(Strength ~gender + age + house_sol + commercial_goods+ school_level+bmi+landsize_in_daba +livestock + household_size, data = data )
  
  options(na.action = "na.fail")
  strength_model_selection <- dredge(strength_model)
  options(na.action = "na.omit")
  
  strength_model_average <- summary(model.avg(strength_model_selection))
  
  strength_model_average_coef <- as.data.frame(strength_model_average$coefmat.full)
  strength_model_average_coef$model <- "Strength"
  strength_model_average_coef$Variable <- rownames(strength_model_average_coef)
  
    
  #Betweenness Centrality
   betweenness_model <- lm(Betweenness ~gender + age + house_sol + commercial_goods+ school_level+bmi+landsize_in_daba +livestock + household_size, data = data )
  
  options(na.action = "na.fail")
  betweenness_model_selection <- dredge(betweenness_model)
  options(na.action = "na.omit")
  
  betweenness_model_average <- summary(model.avg(betweenness_model_selection))
  
  betweenness_model_average_coef <- as.data.frame(betweenness_model_average$coefmat.full)
  betweenness_model_average_coef$model <- "betweenness"
  betweenness_model_average_coef$Variable <- rownames(betweenness_model_average_coef)
  betweenness_model_average_coef$`Adjusted SE` <- NA
    betweenness_model_average_coef <-   betweenness_model_average_coef %>% select(colnames(  strength_model_average_coef))
  
   #Eigenvector Centrality
  eigen_model <- lm(Eigen ~gender + age + house_sol + commercial_goods+ school_level+bmi+landsize_in_daba +livestock + household_size, data = data )
  
  options(na.action = "na.fail")
  eigen_model_selection <- dredge(eigen_model)
  options(na.action = "na.omit")
  
  eigen_model_average <- summary(model.avg(eigen_model_selection))
  
  eigen_model_average_coef <- as.data.frame(eigen_model_average$coefmat.full)
  eigen_model_average_coef$model <- "eigen"
  eigen_model_average_coef$Variable <- rownames(eigen_model_average_coef)
  

  top_model <- get.models(eigen_model_selection, 1)[[1]]
  plot(top_model)
  
  model_average_coef <- rbind(pagerank_model_average_coef, strength_model_average_coef, betweenness_model_average_coef,eigen_model_average_coef)
  
  model_average_coef$season <- season
  
  return(model_average_coef)
}
```

```{r}
pca_result$x

library(psych)
fa.parallel(centrality_vars2, fa = "fa")  # Gives you a scree plot + eigenvalues

scree(centrality_vars2) 

factor_analysis <- fa(centrality_vars2, 
                nfactors = 1,
                rotate = "varimax",
                fm = "ml",              # Maximum Likelihood method
                scores = "regression", missing = TRUE) 

factor_analysis$loadings
factor_analysis$communalities
factor_analysis$Vaccounted
print(factor_analysis)

fa.diagram(factor_analysis, cex = 1.2, e.size = 0.1, rsize = 0.2)
```
